entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
